services.title: Company Secretarial Services
services.description: Get your company registration, maintain statutory books and records, provide company secretary services, attend meetings, and prepare minutes for directors and shareholders.

services.title: Bookkeeping & Related Services
services.description: We provide record keeping, bank reconciliations, financial statement preparation, payroll processing, cash flow projection, budgetary services, fixed assets register maintenance, and QuickBooks package installation for your business.

services.title: Private Sector Assurance & Other Assignments
services.description: This includes assurance, statistical audits, compilation, fixed asset verifications, asset register development, and inventory verifications.

services.title: Tax Advisory & Planning
services.description: All of your tax planning, compliance assistance, computation preparation, return completion, audit preparation, Department of Inland Revenue queries, and tax clearances.

services.title: Payroll and HR Services
services.description: We utilize computer programs for payroll processing, ensuring client confidentiality of salary information, and managing additional pay-related services like EPF, ETF, and PAYE.

services.title: Trade Name & Trademark Registration
services.description: We assist with all your trade name or trademark registration and the entire process.
